data.body:
Objective: Ship OpenRouter configuration UX including API key input and model/cost visibility.

Notes: Depends on waves 1-2. UI tasks can be parallelized across section layout, API wiring, and cost-table rendering.

Assigned tasks:
- Add OpenRouter section to Settings sheet
- Wire frontend settings API methods for OpenRouter
- Render model catalog with cost columns
- Add UI coverage for OpenRouter settings flows

data.title: Scene ledger-goodfellas: Settings UI
